testimonials.name: Mandate-Specific Operators
testimonials.text: Where local delivery is required, PAG engages independent operators under clear scope, regulatory, and lifecycle accountability definitions.

testimonials.name: Institutional Counterparties
testimonials.text: PAG provides a disciplined structuring layer that aligns multi-party obligations before execution begins.

testimonials.name: International Suppliers
testimonials.text: Supplier participation is framed through enforceable architecture that protects mandate integrity across jurisdictions.
